about_the_game:
attention
This is a work with a very large amount of scenario text.
The UI translation will be done by the author, but we cannot guarantee the translation of the scenario.
We are sorry, but in some cases, we may leave the scenario file accessible to anyone so that it can be translated by volunteers.


Your friends are killed as a sacrifice.

　And you were given the power.
"You can revive ...... your friends by sacrificing your enemies or yourself."
　 What would you sacrifice?




The battle system is a deck-building battle in which players fight by collecting cards.
　Collect them at each location and prepare for enemies with diverse characteristics and weaknesses!
.

Aim for the "break" state by breaking the enemy's shield.
　By doing so, you can inflict heavy damage all you want, and the enemy cannot attack you!

The scenario has branches.
　The main character sacrifices either himself or his enemies,
　The items dropped, the companions, and the story will change depending on whether the protagonist sacrifices "himself" or "his enemies.
　Depending on the route, you may be separated from your friends. ......
.

Growth and deckbuilding.
The great art of "The Legacy of the Ancestors" is released as the scenario progresses.
It can turn the tide of the war,
　It is not something that can be used over and over again.
.

attention
This is a work with a very large amount of scenario text.
The UI translation will be done by the author, but we cannot guarantee the translation of the scenario.
We are sorry, but in some cases, we may leave the scenario file accessible to anyone so that it can be translated by volunteers.


Your friends are killed as a sacrifice.

　And you were given the power.
"You can revive ...... your friends by sacrificing your enemies or yourself."
　 What would you sacrifice?




The battle system is a deck-building battle in which players fight by collecting cards.
　Collect them at each location and prepare for enemies with diverse characteristics and weaknesses!
.

Aim for the "break" state by breaking the enemy's shield.
　By doing so, you can inflict heavy damage all you want, and the enemy cannot attack you!

The scenario has branches.
　The main character sacrifices either himself or his enemies,
　The items dropped, the companions, and the story will change depending on whether the protagonist sacrifices "himself" or "his enemies.
　Depending on the route, you may be separated from your friends. ......

Growth and deckbuilding.
The great art of "The Legacy of the Ancestors" is released as the scenario progresses.
It can turn the tide of the war,
　It is not something that can be used over and over again.
.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10+ (x86_64) 〜Big Sur ver11.6
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz デュアルコアIntel Core i5
  • Memory: 900 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 900 MB available space

name: Warehuman -ウェアヒューマン-
short_description: Sacrifice your enemies, yourself, and everything else to protect your friends. The system is an "adventure + deck-building card game. Your choices will create a bloody history.
